EmailTemplate.subject: RE: T Erickson Fm I-9 (1335907078.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 110 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, I would love to meet you in person! If it works for you, Thursday is best for me as I have to leave the office early tomorrow for a doctor’s appointment. Do you prefer morning or afternoon on Thursday? Morning – I can do 10am and 10:30am Afternoon – any time after 2pm. Just let me know and I will send you an invite via outlook– looking forward to meeting you in person! Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Tom Erickson [mailto:terickson@apnbok.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 01, 2012 12:37 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: T Erickson Fm I-9 Sara – I am glad to know you will continue as my contact. Since we will be working together, I would like to visit your office and introduce myself. I have a meeting in Tyson’s Corner from 8 to 10 on Wednesday, but otherwise Wednesday and Thursday are open. Would you have a half-hour to spare? Tom From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 5:19 PM To: Tom Erickson Subject: RE: T Erickson Fm I-9 Hi Tom, I will continue to be your contact. We don’t give out contact names at our clients but we do allow you to state that you are working with an “approved vender MBO Partners as an Associate.” If you are curious about whom we have a master agreement with you can ask me a few names and I will look them up to tell you if we have an MSA. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Erickson [mailto:terickson@apnbok.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 4:57 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: T Erickson Fm I-9 Excellent, Sara. Time to get to work. Will you continue as my business partner? If not, how soon can I meet that person? You have several companies on your list of Master Service Agreements that I would like to contact as quickly as possible. Tom From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Monday, April 30, 2012 3:56 PM To: Tom Erickson Subject: RE: T Erickson Fm I-9 Hi Tom, This is prefect – thank you! You have completed the MBO registration. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
